findfour.shared.game

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • findfour.shared.game.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a connect4 game board.
    Author:
    ciske

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int COLUMNS
      The number of columns the game board has.
      static int ROWS
      The number of rows the game board has.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Creates a new board instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getNextFreeSlot(int column)
      Returns the next free row of a column or - 1 if the row is full.
      Disc getSlot(int column, int row)
      Returns the current disc at a given column and row.
      Disc getWinner()
      Returns the disc color of the winner, or Disc.None if no one has won yet.
      boolean hasWinner()
      Returns whether the game has a winner.
      boolean isFull()
      Returns whether the board is full with discs other than Disc.None.
      boolean isMoveValid(int column, Disc disc)
      Checks if a move is valid.
      void makeMove(int column, Disc disc)
      Makes a move on the current board.
      void setSlot(int column, int row, Disc disc)
      Sets a slot to the specified disc.
      void syncTo(Board board)
      Synchronized the board state to the given board state.
